CVE-2022-25878.fixReason: Prototype pollution `Object.freeze` remediation was not detected, The vulnerable function protobufjs.parse is called with external input, The vulnerable function protobufjs.load(Sync) is called
CVE-2022-25878.fullDescription:
The scanner checks whether any of the following vulnerable functions are called:

* `util.setProperty` with external input to its 2nd (`path`) or 3rd (`value`) arguments.
* `ReflectionObject.setParsedOption` with external input to its 2nd (`name`) or 3rd (`value`) arguments.
* `parse` with external input to its 1st (`source`) argument.
* `load`
* `loadSync`

The scanner also checks whether the `Object.freeze()` remediation is not present.

CVE-2021-3807.fixReason: The scanner checks whether the vulnerable function `ansi-regex` is called.
CVE-2021-3807.fullDescription: The scanner checks whether the vulnerable function `ansi-regex` is called.

CVE-2021-3918.fixReason:
The scanner checks whether any of the following vulnerable functions are called:

* `json-schema.validate` with external input to its 1st (`instance`) argument.
* `json-schema.checkPropertyChange` with external input to its 2nd (`schema`) argument.

The scanner also checks whether the `Object.freeze()` remediation is not present.
